ygData.subject: Re: EQ account for sale
ygData.msgSnippet: That s exactly what my issue was, couldn have said it better myself. Ariell, Karana
ygData.messageBody:
That's exactly what my issue was, couldn' have said it better myself.

Ariell, Karana

Abraham Hardjana wrote:

> From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
> I think you have missed the point, people are disgusted with the fact that
> this list is being used as medium for selling the account. I couldn't
> care less if he wanted to sell his EQ account, he should refrain from
> posting it to this mailing list. As a whole this list is an informative
> and intelligent list about bards, not the sale of accounts. I think we
> are all very well grounded in reality. I myself have reached lvl 18 and
> think that my grasp on reality is good enough (until I die 6 times in a
> row to a SF in S Ro =).
>
> Treilanin - Bard of Kelethin - 18th Rank - Karana
> Aariel - Mage of Felwithe - 14th Circle - Karana
